topReasons.title: Top Reasons
topReasons.tooltip: Top reasons are classified in the tool as "high impact" reasons for leaving, or counted if an employee gives only one reason for leaving.

chart.conductedInfoTooltip: Interview information is visible once the employee has left the company, and can be viewed according to the selected time range.

exitSurvey.label: Exit Survey
exitSurvey.tooltip: Click here to compare qualitative Digital Exit Interviews results with quantitative Exit Survey results.
